credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Anonymous Donor, Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener, Mr. and Mrs. Max B. Furman, Mrs. John Innes Kane, James M. Osborn, and Thonet Industries, Inc.
title: Bowl
medium: Slumped, fused, and shaped glass threads
description: Hemispherical bowl formed of layered glass threads in iridescent black, scarlet, pale and medium green, mauve.  Individual threads pulled and slumped into form, edges manipulated to create irregular edge folds and indentations.  Interior layered with red; exterior primarily black with green and mauve passages at opposite edges.
name: Bowl
